Text:
Quality is excellent A/10 V/10. Probably the best 3D effect in a movie I have seen to date. The only downside for me was the DTS audio as my LG 3D TV doesn't recognise that format. However, a quick conversion to AC3 with PopCorn soon sorted that out!
Thank you uploader. Great work
How do you watch these movies once I download it?

@ xapxam22grunge:
Could you please let me know how I need to convert the audio.. i have same problem in my LG 3D TV for this movie and also for Avatar.
xapxam22grunge I have the same problem that PVanand my LG 3D cannot process DTS audio format, could you let us know haow you do it please???
personaly i have a 60 in. dlp directly hooked up to my PC with HDMI and the glasses emiter...NOOO problems here;)    Thanks for the movie

Guys, use MKV2AC3, to convert DTS audio for AC3.
Take less than a 20 minutes to convert and preserve all original chanells, and play perfectly in LG TVÂ´s. In mine LG LW5700 42" works perfectly. :)

MKV2AC3 is freeware:

http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Video/Encoders-Converter-DIVX-Related/MKV2AC3.shtml
